basic_info.description: I'm a software engineer with a journey that began as a frontend developer, crafting intuitive user interfaces that captivate and engage users. Over time, my passion for technology and problem-solving led me to a broader horizon. Today, my focus extends beyond pixel-perfect designs to the heart of business challenges. I specialize in architecting software solutions that cut through complexities, streamline operations, and drive growth. With a keen eye for detail and an insatiable appetite for innovation, I'm dedicated to creating technology that not only works but thrives in real-world scenarios. Join me on this exploration of my portfolio, where you'll discover the evolution of a frontend developer into a seasoned software engineer. Let's build solutions that matter.

projects.title: Loblaw Advanced
projects.description: The product leverages deep insights into Canadian shopper behavior, combining loyalty programs, media, analytics, and strategic planning to help brands connect with customers effectively. It offers integrated solutions to deliver targeted, omni-channel marketing and merchandising experiences.

projects.title: Brandy-AI
projects.description: A Micro-SaaS, that generates branding snippets and keywords for marketing purposes using generative AI via OPEN-AI API

projects.title: Paypal - library of components
projects.description: A Library of components for Paypal's rebrand launch of the existing platform and marketing pages, designed to be customized via Contentful CMS

projects.title: NASM - kiosk apps for Smithsonian Museum
projects.description: Project name "NASM" - a set of 25 interactive apps developed for Smithsonian museum. Developed with ReactJS, and Wordpress-based CMS. The demo link is one of the apps called "Build your own solar system"

projects.title: Globalcot
projects.description: Reworked legacy website of Globalcot FZE. The website has been redesigned and optimized for search engines and mobile devices, to provide a seamless user experience

projects.title: VR Training Module
projects.description: A VR training app developed using Unity platform, with the intention to be used as a training simulator for the new hires in the The Commons, of Memorial University of Newfoundland.
